item.title: Events and Programs
item.description: 🚀 New August 2025 Sessions of “AI for the Rest of Us” - A Hands-On Workshops - I’ll be hosting new AI for the Rest of Us: Hands-On Workshops on August 2, 9, and 16, from 9:30-11:00 AM (CT). For August only, we are offering them at $25.00 (USD). Please click the link above for more information. 🕯️ 🍃 July-September 2025 - Sign up for free Mindful Meet-Up sessions: July-September 2025 🕯️ 🍃 A Two-Minute Mindfulness Break: It’s a brief reset for your mind and body.

item.title: AI for the Rest of Us: A Hands-On Workshop
item.description:
🚀 ANNOUNCING three new “AI for the Rest of Us”: Hands-On Workshops: August 2, 9, and 16, 2025.

I’ve been reflecting on what makes our upcoming AI workshop truly special. I wanted to share more about the journey we’ll take together…
